Field.ElementPreceedingHeader:
Thank you for completing this questionnaire!

This questionnaire will help us to better understand your general health and any problems related to bone and muscle conditions.

Your completion of this questionnaire is completely voluntary and your responses will be held in the strictest confidence.

Please answer every question. Some questions may look like others, but each one is different.

There are no right or wrong answers. If you are not sure how to answer a question, just give the best answer you can. You can make comments at the end of the questionnaire. Please note the question number in your comments. We do read all your comments, so feel free to make as many as you wish.

Some kind of problems can make it hard to do many activities, such as eating, bathing, school work, and playing with friends. We would like to find out how your child is doing. (Select one response on each line.) During the <u>last week</u> was it easy or hard for your child to:

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Easy
1 2, A little hard
2 3, Very hard
3 4, Can't do at all
4 5, Too young for this activity
5

Field.ElementLabel:
36. Can your child participate in recreational outdoor activities with other children the same age?
(For example: bicycling, tricycling, skating, hiking, jogging) (Select one response.)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1,1 Yes, easily 
 2, 2 Yes, but a little hard 
 3, 3 Yes, but very hard 
 4, 4 No

Field.ElementNote: (If 'Yes,' you will be taken to question 44, if 'No', question 37)

Field.ElementLabel: If you answered "no" to Question 36 above, was your child's activity limited by: (Circle yes to all that apply)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 37. Pain? 
 2, 38. General health? 
 3, 39. Doctor or parent instructions? 
 4, 40. Fear the other kids won't like him/her? 
 5, 41. Dislike of recreational outdoor activities? 
 6, 42. Too young? 
 7, 43. Activity not in season?

StructuredValue.Value: 40. Fear the other kids won't like him/her?

Field.ElementLabel:
44. Can your child participate in pickup games or sports with other children the same age?
(For example: tag, dodge ball, basketball, soccer, catch, jump rope, touch football, hop scotch)
(Select one response.)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1,1 Yes, easily 
 2, 2 Yes, but a little hard 
 3, 3 Yes, but very hard 
 4, 4 No

Field.ElementNote: (If 'Yes,' you will be taken to question 52, if 'No', question 45)

Field.ElementLabel: If you answered "no" to Question 44 above, was your child's activity limited by: (Circle yes to all that apply)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 45. Pain? 
 2, 46. General health? 
 3, 47. Doctor or parent instructions? 
 4, 48. Fear the other kids won't like him/her? 
 5, 49. Dislike of pickup games or sports? 
 6, 50. Too young? 
 7, 51. Activity not in season?

StructuredValue.Value: 48. Fear the other kids won't like him/her?
49. Dislike of pickup games or sports?

Field.ElementLabel:
52. Can your child participate in competitive level sports with other children the same age?
(For example: hockey, basketball, soccer, football, baseball, swimming, running [track or cross country],
gymnastics, or dance) (Select one response.)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 Yes, easily 
 2, 2 Yes, but a little hard 
 3, 3 Yes, but very hard 
 4, 4 No

Field.ElementNote: (If 'Yes,' you will be taken to question 60, if 'No', question 53)

Field.ElementLabel: If you answered no to Question 52 above, was your child's activity limited by: (Circle yes to all that apply)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 53. Pain? 
 2, 54. General health? 
 3, 55. Doctor or parent instructions? 
 4, 56. Fear the other kids won't like him/her? 
 5, 57. Dislike of competitive level sports? 
 6, 58. Too young? 
 7, 59. Activity not in season?

StructuredValue.Value: 56. Fear the other kids won't like him/her?

Field.ElementLabel: 60. How often in the <u>last week</u> did your child get together and do things with friends? (Select one response.)

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, 1 Often \n 2, 2 Sometimes \n 3, 3 Never or rarely

Field.ElementNote: (If 'Often' you will be taken to question 66, if 'Sometimes' or 'Never or rarely', question 61)

Field.ElementLabel: If you answered "sometimes" or "never or rarely" to Question 60 above, was your child's activity limited by: (Choose all that apply.)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 61. Pain?
2, 62. General health? 
3, 63. Doctor or parent instructions?
4, 64. Fear the other kids won't like him/her?
5, 65. Friends not around?

StructuredValue.Value: 64. Fear the other kids won't like him/her?

Field.ElementLabel: 66. How often in the <u>last week</u> did your child participate in gym/recess? (Select one response.)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 Often 
 2, 2 Sometimes 
 3, 3 Never or rarely 
 4, 4 No gym or recess

Field.ElementNote: (If 'Often' you will be taken to question 74, if 'Sometimes' or 'Never or rarely', question 67)

Field.ElementLabel: If your child answered "sometimes" or "never or rarely" to Question 66 above, was your child's activity limited by: (Choose all that apply.)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 67. Pain?
2, 68. General health?
3, 69. Doctor or parent instructions?
4,70. Fear the other kids won't like your child?
5, 71. Dislike of gym/recess?
6, 72. School not in session?
7, 73. Does not attend school?

StructuredValue.Value: 70. Fear the other kids won't like your child?

Field.ElementLabel: 74. Is it easy or hard for your child to make friends with children his/her own age? (Select one response.)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 Usually easy 
2, 2 Sometimes easy 
3, 3 Sometimes hard
 4, 4 Usually hard

Field.ElementLabel: 75. How much pain has your child had during the <u>last week</u>? (Select one response.)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 None
 2, 2 Very mild
 3, 3 Mild
4, 4 Moderate
 5, 5 Severe 
6, 6 Very severe

Field.ElementLabel: 76. During the <u>last week</u>, how much did pain interfere with your child's normal activities (including at home, outside of the home, and at school)? (Select one response.)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 Not at all
 2, 2 A little bit 
3, 3 Moderately 
4, 4 Quite a bit 
5, 5 Extremely
